---
title: "dm 101"
format: html
---

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
```
```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
```


```{r}
data("EuStockMarkets")
df <- as.data.frame(EuStockMarkets)
df$time <- time(EuStockMarkets)
```


```{r}
ggplot(df, aes(x=time,y=DAX))+geom_line()
```

```{r}
EuStockMarkets <-
  EuStockMarkets |>
  as_tibble() |> 
  mutate(date = time(EuStockMarkets))
```

```{r}
ggplot(EuStockMarkets, aes(x=date,y=CAC))+
  geom_line(color = "blue")+
  geom_line(mapping=aes(y=DAX),color = "salmon")
```
#Tidyr solutions

```{r}
EuStockMarkets |>
  pivot_longer(!date, names_to ="index") |>
  slice_head(n=18)
  
```
```{r}
EuStockMarkets |>
  pivot_longer(!date, names_to ="index") |>
  ggplot(aes(x=date,y=value,colour=index))+
  geom_line()
  
```
